recordTypes.name: Peddler, Solicitor, Transient Merchant & Mobile Vendor
recordTypes.description: Any peddler, solicitor, transient merchant or mobile vendor must obtain a license from the Police Department prior to conducting any business in the City of Burnsville.

recordTypes.name: Development Application
recordTypes.description: One application for all Development Application types (Conditional Use Permit, Planned Unit Development, Preliminary/Final Plat, Interim Use Permit, Comprehensive Plan Amendment, Zoning Ordinance Amendment, Rezoning, Variance, etc.)

recordTypes.name: Renewing Your License
recordTypes.description: If you are renewing your license, DO NOT apply for a new one. Click here for instructions on renewing your current license.

recordTypes.name: Renewing Your Rental License
recordTypes.description: If you are renewing your license, DO NOT apply for a new one. Click here for instructions on renewing your current license.

recordTypes.name: Recreational Fire Permit
recordTypes.description: No Fee

recordTypes.name: Business Massage Therapist License
recordTypes.description: Businesses with store front locations and persons working as Independent Contractors.

recordTypes.name: Single Family Rental License
recordTypes.description: Rental license for private owners who own a  single family home, townhome, condo unit,  twin home or duplex. For duplex owners, each side is considered a separate unit and each unit is required to have a rental license.

recordTypes.name: Buckthorn Wrench Rental
recordTypes.description: Application to rent a "weed wrench, " a tool  that can be used to lift and remove small buckthorn by their roots. The tool is available for Burnsville residents only.

recordTypes.name: Single Family Rental License  .
recordTypes.description: Rental license for private owners who own a  single family home, townhome, condo unit,  twin home or duplex. For duplex owners, each side is considered a separate unit and each unit is required to have a rental license.

recordTypes.name: Permanent Sign Permit
recordTypes.description: Required for businesses installing permanent signs. One application must be submitted for each sign.

recordTypes.name: Employed Massage Therapist License
recordTypes.description: Massage therapists that are employed at Business locations.

recordTypes.name: Residential Building Permit
recordTypes.description: Application for residential construction projects, including, but not limited to, new homes, remodels, additions, roofing, and decks.  Permits may be submitted by a licensed contractor or the property owner.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Letter
recordTypes.description: If you require written documentation of zoning information for a property, please submit a request for a zoning letter. This includes current zoning and comprehensive plan information, FEMA floodplain information, and any current zoning or building code violations.

recordTypes.name: Multi Family Rental License
recordTypes.description: Rental license for multifamily rental. For a apartment complex or a townhome complex.

recordTypes.name: Liquor License Application
recordTypes.description: Includes on-sale intoxicating, Sunday on-sale, on-sale wine, on-sale 3.2 percent malt liquor, off-sale, off-sale 3.2 percent malt liquor, taproom, brewpub and brewer malt liquor.

recordTypes.name: Commercial Construction Permit
recordTypes.description: Application for commercial construction projects, including, but not limited to, new, tenant buildout, demo, remodel, and roofing.

recordTypes.name: Liquor License: Change in Operating Manager, Shareholders or Officers/Directors
recordTypes.description: When there is a change in the Operating Manager, Shareholders or Officers/Directors establishments must complete appropriate applications forms, and pay the associated fee. A background check will be conducted on the new application.

recordTypes.name: Seasonal Sales Permit
recordTypes.description: For any temporary/seasonal outdoor sale, a permit is required. Each permit is valid for up to 90 days, and each site will receive no more than 2 permits (up to 90 days each) per year.

recordTypes.name: Retail Tobacco Sales License
recordTypes.description: Tobacco, tobacco related products, nicotine and electronic delivery devices.

recordTypes.name: Zoning Verification
recordTypes.description: For auto dealers or other businesses needing a zoning approval sign off on a state license form.

recordTypes.name: Cell Permit
recordTypes.description: Application for commercial construction projects, including, but not limited to, new, tenant buildout, demo, remodel, and roofing.

recordTypes.name: Tree Removal
recordTypes.description: When trees will be removed on project 2 acres or larger. Application requires a site survey, Tree Evaluation Worksheets, and Woodland Preservation Cash or Letter of Credit.

recordTypes.name: Lawful Gambling
recordTypes.description: Gambling Occasions and Premise Permit

recordTypes.name: Electrical Permit
recordTypes.description: Electrical Permits may be submitted by a licensed electrical contractor or property owners who own and occupy the home.

recordTypes.name: Fireplace Permit
recordTypes.description: A permit is required for the new installation or replacement of a fireplace. If you are doing gas piping for the fireplace, contractors must have a city license, as well as a mechanical bond through the state.

recordTypes.name: Municipal Solid Waste Hauling License
recordTypes.description: Application for license to collect municipal solid waste and recyclables.

recordTypes.name: Resellers License
recordTypes.description: Includes pawnbrokers, secondhand goods dealers and precious metal dealers.

recordTypes.name: Mechanical Permit
recordTypes.description: Mechanical permits may be submitted by a licensed mechanical contractor or the property owner. Contractors must have a mechanical bond, as well as a city license.

recordTypes.name: Plumbing Permit
recordTypes.description: Plumbing permits may be submitted by a licensed plumbing contractor or property owners who own and occupy the home.

recordTypes.name: Commercial Kennel License
recordTypes.description: For commercial kennel licenses only. Residential Kennel Licenses are handled by City of Burnsville Police Department.

recordTypes.name: Tree License
recordTypes.description: Any business that cuts, trims, prunes, removes, sprays or otherwise treats trees or shrubs must apply for a City Tree Contractor License.

recordTypes.name: Backflow Preventer Permit
recordTypes.description: Application must be completed by a certified tester, or their representative. A signed testing form is required when the application is completed by anyone other than a state-certified tester.

recordTypes.name: Grading Permit
recordTypes.description: Application for commercial construction projects, including, but not limited to, new, tenant buildout, demo, remodel, and roofing.

recordTypes.name: Vehicle Storage Permit
recordTypes.description: Temporary storage areas for automobile dealerships to store consumer vehicle inventory at existing parking lots where there is sufficient excess capacity in the B-3, B-4, CRD, I-3, GIM, GIH, and MIX zoning districts. Used for the storage of "new" vehicles only.

recordTypes.name: Private Utility Permit
recordTypes.description: Application for commercial  water and sewer installation or repair.

categories.name: Building Department
categories.content: <h2 style="box-sizing: border-box; margin-top: 0.167em; margin-bottom: 0px; border: 0px none; font-family: Muli; font-style: normal; font-weight: 700; color: rgb(46, 91, 122); font-size: 1.8em; text-decoration: none; display: block; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-align: left; text-indent: 0px; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; background-color: rgb(255, 255,

categories.name: Rental License
categories.content:
Rental License is required for

  • Single-family homes
  • Condominiums
  • Townhomes

categories.name: Fire Department
categories.content:
The Burnsville Fire Department is now accepting online permit applications only. If you have questions or need assistance with permit submissions please contact: 

Burnsville Fire Department
14275 Newton Ave
Burnsville, MN 55306

categories.name: Business Licensing
categories.content: The City of Burnsville does not provide a General Business License. However, it issues licenses for Liquor, Tobacco, Massage, Reseller/Pawn, Commercial Kennels, and Waste Haulers.

categories.name: Neighborhood Services
categories.content: <h2 style="box-sizing: border-box; font-family: Muli; font-weight: 700; line-height: 1.25; color: rgb(46, 91, 122); margin-top: 0.167em; margin-bottom: 0px; font-size: 1.8em; text-transform: none; white-space: normal; font-style: normal; font-variant-ligatures: normal; font-variant-caps: normal; letter-spacing: normal; orphans: 2; text-indent: 0px; widows: 2; word-spacing: 0px; -webkit-text-stroke-width: 0px; text-decoration: none; border: 0px none; display: block; text-align: left; background-c

categories.name: Appeals
categories.content: The Administrative Appeal process was established to offer an alternative and uniform method to resolve disputes regarding city code violations rather than relying on the court system. A property owner, resident, business, or licensee receiving a Notice of Code Violation(s) may contest the alleged violation(s) and any fees, civil penalties or adverse license actions. A person contesting a code enforcement or licensing violation shall complete the online Administrative Appeal Hearing Request F
